external_references.source_name: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022
external_references.description: Unit 42. (2022, February 25). Spear Phishing Attacks Target Organizations in Ukraine, Payloads Include the Document Stealer OutSteel and the Downloader SaintBot. Retrieved June 9, 2022.

objects.description: [Saint Bot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1018) can run a batch script named `del.bat` to remove any [Saint Bot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1018) payload-linked files from a compromise system if anti-analysis or locale checks fail.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022 )
